## vision\_v1p1beta1.Schema$InputConfig interface

The desired input location and metadata.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Schema$InputConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [content](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_inputconfig.content.md) | string \| null | File content, represented as a stream of bytes. Note: As with all <code>bytes</code> fields, protobuffers use a pure binary representation, whereas JSON representations use base64.<!-- -->Currently, this field only works for BatchAnnotateFiles requests. It does not work for AsyncBatchAnnotateFiles requests. |
|  [gcsSource](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_inputconfig.gcssource.md) | [Schema$GcsSource](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_gcssource.md) | The Google Cloud Storage location to read the input from. |
|  [mimeType](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_inputconfig.mimetype.md) | string \| null | The type of the file. Currently only "application/pdf", "image/tiff" and "image/gif" are supported. Wildcards are not supported. |
